Package org.neo4j.internal.schema

Interface ConstraintDescriptor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SchemaDescriptorSupplier, SchemaRule
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IndexBackedConstraintDescriptor, NodeExistenceConstraintDescriptor, NodeKeyConstraintDescriptor, RelExistenceConstraintDescriptor, UniquenessConstraintDescriptor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConstraintDescriptorImplementation
    public interface ConstraintDescriptor
extends SchemaDescriptorSupplier, SchemaRule

        boolean isRelationshipPropertyExistenceConstraint()
        Test if this constraint descriptor is a relationship property existence constraint.
        Returns:
        true if calling asRelationshipPropertyExistenceConstraint() would not throw.

      • asRelationshipPropertyExistenceConstraint

        RelExistenceConstraintDescriptor asRelationshipPropertyExistenceConstraint()
        Returns:
        this constraint descriptor as a RelExistenceConstraintDescriptor if possible, or throw an IllegalStateException.

      • withId

        ConstraintDescriptor withId​(long id)
        Produce a copy of this constraint descriptor, that has the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the new constraint descriptor.
        Returns:
        a modified copy of this constraint descriptor.

      • withName

        ConstraintDescriptor withName​(String name)
        Produce a copy of this constraint descriptor, that has the given name. If the given name is null, then this descriptor is returned unchanged.
        Specified by:
        withName in interface SchemaRule
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new constraint descriptor.
        Returns:
        a modified copy of this constraint descriptor.

      • withOwnedIndexId

        IndexBackedConstraintDescriptor withOwnedIndexId​(long id)
        Produce a copy of this constraint descriptor, that has the given owned index id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the index that this constraint descriptor owns.
        Returns:
        a modified copy of this constraint descriptor.

      • getId

        long getId()
        Return the id of this constraint descriptor, if it has any, or throw an IllegalStateException.
        Specified by:
        getId in interface SchemaRule
        Returns:
        the id of this constraint descriptor.
        See Also:
        SchemaRule.getId()
